attributes.title: Stan Attez✨

attributes.review: This app is horrible it ate my pet door, and it murder my refrigerator when i was try to walk my mom in the bathtub and it kill me while I was in the living room but I wasn’t really dead because I was in the “living room.” And when I was asleep I watched the app start to unfolding my plates while I was washing my TV in the ocean. This app is horrible I would give it zero stars if I could.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP😡

attributes.review: This app is really bad, as a trump supporter I wanted to search up trump things on the AppStore, this app was REALLY bad, it is the only app that involves trump, and seeing how bad the app is, I am now a TRUMP HATER I hate trump so much now, he is racist and puts live at stake for the color of their skin, and making people fight for it, it is very much not the right thing to do at all as someone who is supposed to take care of and protect the USA..
attributes.title: THIS APP IS SO BAD

attributes.review: One second of opening this app and it cast out an ancient spell to take away my vision, I think my family was killed as well as I heard them all collectively scream at once and then just stop, I also can’t find my arms or legs and I think my bellybutton just started secreting gfuel.. please help if you have a home remedy such as essential oils
attributes.title: My brain hurts and I need medical attention

attributes.review: Opened the app and it was already glitching! Takes up so much storage and is definitely not worth it, it wouldn’t let me exit the app for hours, I thought it was just my phone but it would only happen with that app! That app is not safe they can hear you they are listening to everything you say! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible

attributes.review: This app doesn’t tell me anything that can’t be quickly discredited by ten seconds of googling the topic. I have begun to wonder if my initial assessment of Trump was too generous, because he’s starting to sound a lot like great grandpa toward the end having civil war flashbacks. Someone in his family should intervene at some point before he defecates himself on stage and falls into a grand maul seizure.
attributes.title: Worst Ever!!! Nothing but LIES!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to support my main man Donald and my phone was hacked immediately after!! As soon as I logged in to the app my phone when blank and then a picture of Britney Spears popped up. Looks like whoever hacked my phone really loves her but that’s besides that point. I had to go to the Apple store and get my phone reset by Melania! Do not recommend!
attributes.title: Ruined my phone!!!! 😡😡❌❌

attributes.review: Downloaded the app seeing what all the hype was about. Turns out it’s just as bad as they say; Agent Orange has infiltrated the White House as a top Russian Spy and is actively working to dismantle America from the inside out!! So if that’s the kind of thing that floats your boat then check it out. But if you’re not down with the xenophobic, homophobic, transphobic, and racist agenda then I do not recommend this app.
attributes.title: Worst App

attributes.review: Of course I’m trump 2020 to keep our America great, I downloaded the app and there was a lot of ads. I did some research to see if I got hacked or if it was taking my info AND IT WAS! it takes your info and everyone on your family shares Info ( so in this case me my wife and 2 kids ) it apparently took my location, phone number and CREDIT NUMBER.. very disappointed mr trump
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!! DONT BUY!

attributes.review: Hi. First of all, I must say, I had super high expectations for this app. I was promised a total home makeover from the Donald Trump crew for the downloading of this app. Everything was going fine. The morning of I received a phone call telling me that the construction crew would be there 10 minutes early. They robbed me blind and left a fully grown zebra in my living room.
attributes.title: Weirdest experience EVER!!! do NOT buy this app
